text: She has been one of New York Fashion Week's most in demand models, having stormed the runway for a string of leading designers. And Kaia Gerber showed no sign of slowing down as she walked in Anna Sui's Spring Summer 2019 showcase on Monday evening, just hours after commanding attention on Proenza Schouler's runway. The 17 - year - old star, who has been one of NYFW's most sought - after models, flaunted her versatility as she sampled an array of eccentric looks, with top model sisters Gigi and Bella Hadid also strutting their stuff in the showcase.
